works.description: I wrote the article "10 Tips to Quit Drinking Alcohol" in 2008 and it has been on my website since then. It is fully copyrighted. The infringing website has stolen 1/2 of my article, and is using it verbatim beginning about halfway down their page, starting with the words "Do not keep alcohol at home or work". They are also using ADSENSE to make money off of articles they have stolen!
